name: LOTS OF BAD ONES
description:
Can you survive against the bad ones?

Featuring many (2) varieties of enemies, enjoy hours (minutes) of riveting gameplay! Just watch out for the battle-class frigate ship, COVID-19!

Solo project made using 100% original assets, from the music down to each individual pixel (except the font but really who makes those).

CONTROLS:

- WASD movement

- mouse-controlled firing

- Esc to pause
